title: Capstone: Applied Finance Project
description: The Capstone project is one of the primary measures of student learning. Evaluation is based on students’ ability to apply course material to the Capstone project. Satisfactory completion of the project is required for award of the degree. Letter grades only. Prerequisites: MGTF 401, MGTF 402, MGTF 403, MGTF 404, and restricted to master of finance program or by consent of instructor and department stamp.
